title: Project-Based Chinese Speaking Simulation for Science Domain Experts

context.prior_knowledge: HSK Level 4 or equivalent Chinese language communication proficiency
context.additional_context: A project simulating real research presentations and academic exchanges in VR environments for science professionals

learning_goals: Learners can generate science topic presentation scripts using GenAI tools and revise them through peer feedback
Learners can deliver structured Mandarin presentations of over 10 minutes based on AI-generated content in VR simulations
Learners can achieve over 80% expert-level communication accuracy by using scientific terminology considering cultural contexts

resources: Chinese Terminology Glossary by Science Topic

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
